text_logic_form: The figure is an isosceles trapezoid.
The perimeter of the figure is 74 units.
Find the area of the figure.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The figure is an isosceles trapezoid $ABCD$.
The perimeter of the trapezoid $ABCD$ is 74 units.
Find the area of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CD$ is 19 units.
The length of the line $AB$ is 35 units.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BD$, and $CD$ forming the trapezoid $ABCD$.
